title: Publish Draft Version 26 preview build (run action only)

requirements.summary: Document the operational steps to publish/run Draft Version 26 so it becomes the active preview build at the standard preview URL.
acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 26 is published and becomes the currently running preview build.
The standard preview URL (e.g., https://caffeine.icp.xyz/preview) opens the app running Draft Version 26.

file_operations.description: Create a runbook describing the exact steps to select Draft Version 26 and publish/run it as the active preview build using the standard preview workflow/tooling, including how to verify via the standard preview link and how to confirm the deployed draft/version label if applicable. No application code changes.
